 
{{Server function}}

This function will force the specified player to resend their mod info, triggering the [[/onPlayerModInfo.md|onPlayerModInfo]] event again.

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool resendPlayerModInfo ( player thePlayer )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/player.md|player]]:resendModInfo||}}
===Required Arguments===
*'''thePlayer''': A [[/player.md|player]] object referencing the specified player

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the mod info will be resent, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example== 
This example shows how to resend each players mod info during [[/onResourceStart.md|onResourceStart]]
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addEventHandler( "onResourceStart", resourceRoot,
    function()
        for _,player in ipairs( getElementsByType("player") ) do
            resendPlayerModInfo( player )
        end
    end
)
</syntaxhighlight>
